Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special session hosted by the AACR Radiation Science and Medicine Working Group. The 2022 RSM Town Hall will feature three presentations on current  topics in the radiation science and medicine community, followed by a 15-minute panel discussion. The overarching theme of the session is Dose Adaptation, with topics including Ultrasound and Radiation Therapy Combination Therapies, Dose Modification of the TME, Evolving Landscape of Dose De-escalation. The session will also include a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session.
Location: Grand Ballroom D, Hilton New Orleans Riverside
